com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine

Class SpenContextMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.engine.SpenContextMenu

  • public class SpenContextMenu
extends Object
    This class provides the methods for managing context menus. It provides the basic UI for context menu.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpenContextMenu.CloseListener 
      static interface  SpenContextMenu.ContextMenuListener
      Listener to notify context menu action event

      static int TYPE_WIDE
      Looks for Tablet device

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpenContextMenu

        public SpenContextMenu(Context context,
                       View parent,
                       ArrayList<SpenContextMenuItemInfo> menu,
                       SpenContextMenu.ContextMenuListener selectListener)
        SpenContextMenu constructor
        Parameters:
        context - The context for the application
        parent - The page document that is currently set.
        menu - The list of menu items
        selectListener - The ContextMenuListener instance for handling context menu events.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if parent or menu is null.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • close

        public boolean close()
        Close the context menu. Call this method before destroying the instance to prevent memory leaks.
        Returns:
        Returns true if it succeeded to close. false otherwise.
        Since:
        3.0.0

        public void setItemEnabled(int id,
                           boolean enable)
        Enable the specified context menu item.
        Parameters:
        id - The context menu item ID.
        enable - Set to true to enable the context menu item, false to disable.
        Since:

        Returns:

        false - if the context menu item is not enabled.
